questions.question: Which of the following statements accurately describes the Kerr effect?

answers.a: A phenomenon where light is absorbed by a material and then re-emitted with a delay.
answers.b: A phenomenon where the refractive index of a material changes in response to an applied electric field.
answers.c: A phenomenon where the angle of reflection of light changes as it passes from one medium to another.
answers.d: A phenomenon where light is split into its component colors as it passes through a prism.

questions.question: What is the difference between a Pockels cell and a Kerr cell?

answers.a: A Pockels cell creates a phase shift that is proportional to the voltage, while a Kerr cell creates a phase shift that is proportional to the square of the voltage
answers.b: A Pockels cell creates a phase shift that is proportional to the square of the voltage, while a Kerr cell creates a phase shift that is proportional to the voltage
answers.c: There is no difference between a Pockels cell and a Kerr cell.
